text: Va hangome ki dar taqsimi meros xesovandone ki voris nestand, va jatimon va fuqaroi mustahiq, ki hozir sudand, az in mol, ki ʙeranc va zahmat onro ʙa dast meovared, cize ʙa onho ʙidihed, pas xotiri onhoro taskin (orom) dihed, caro ki dodani in mol ʙa sumo zijone namerasonad va ʙa onho suxani neku ʙigued
